recipe.title: Bigoli with smoked salmon
recipe.instructions:
cup pine nuts
250 g bigoli fresh pasta (or similar)
2 tbs olive oil
 onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/3 cup dry white wine
1 tbs lemon juice
2 tbs lemon zest (divided into 1 tbs + 1 tbs)
 cup cream
2 tbs fresh chives, parsley or dill, chopped
200 g smoked salmon, cut into bite sized pieces
 tsp black pepper
